title: 9/18/2015: TRICITY: Admn mulls shifting three akademies to Mahila Bhawan
content: CHANDIGARH: The UT administration is working out modalities to shift the akademies operational in city to Mahila Bhawan in Sector 38. The municipal corporation had inaugurated the Mahila Bhawan in Sector 38 in March. The three akademies — Sangeet Natak...
